title: # 289 - Eddie Bravo, Sam Tripoli, & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Eddie Bravo and Sam Tripoli and we talk about roller coasters, football, weed, strippers, jiu-jitsu, conspiracy theories, and more!

Go see Eddie and Sam live for the "Tin Foil Hat Comedy Shows" June 1st at Cobbs in San Francisco and June 2nd at the Punchline in Sacramento.  

 

This episode is brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
